name: CVE-2000-0088
description: Buffer overflow in the conversion utilities for Japanese, Korean and Chinese Word 5 documents allows an attacker to execute commands, aka the "Malformed Conversion Data" vulnerability.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office_converter_pack:2000.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:97:*:*:zh:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:97:*:*:ja:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:97:*:*:ko:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:2000:*:*:zh:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:2000:*:*:ja:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:2000:*:*:ko:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:powerpoint:97:*:*:zh:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:powerpoint:97:*:*:ja:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word:98:*:*:zh:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word:98:*:*:ja:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:powerpoint:2000:*:*:ja:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:powerpoint:2000:*:*:ko:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word:97:*:*:zh:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word:2000:*:*:ja:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word:2000:*:*:ko:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word:97:*:*:ja:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word:97:*:*:ko:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:powerpoint:97:*:*:ko:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:powerpoint:2000:*:*:zh:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word:98:*:*:ko:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word:2000:*:*:zh:*:*:*:*')]
